title: Knife River Indian Villages National Historic Site: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions      Plane  Fly into Bismarck or Minot, ND. Hazen, ND (15 miles from site) has an airport for small planes.  Car  One-half mile north of Stanton, ND on County Road 37. One hour northwest of Bismarck, ND and one and a half hours southwest of Minot, ND.  Public Transportation  Charter and tour bus parking available at Visitor Center parking lot.  Â     Area Map
